mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_coupon_list (coupon_id, user_id, is_used, code, use_time, create_time, `operator`, `enable`) values (#{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUsed,jdbcType=BIT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update t_coupon_list set coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_used = #{isUsed,jdbcType=BIT}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_time = #{useTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `enable` = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, coupon_id, user_id, is_used, code, use_time, create_time, `operator`, `enable` from t_coupon_list where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, coupon_id, user_id, is_used, code, use_time, create_time, `operator`, `enable` from t_coupon_list
